attributes.action: MPs who defect to other parties should face mandatory by-election!
attributes.additional_details: That would be democracy in action.
attributes.background:
Over the past few months, we have seen MPs who were elected on a manifesto for a particular political party defect to another party.
This has all been done without a by-election.
We believe that MPs who choose to defect during a parliament should face a mandatory by-election.
